arts.ttl: Getafe's Uche slams LaLiga refs, racism from fans
arts.sum: Getafe's Nigerian midfielder Christantus Uche has criticised LaLiga referees for failing to address the harsh treatment he's received from opposition players and hit out at racist insults he said he's been subjected to from fans.

arts.ttl: Lamine Yamal injury update after Barcelona’s win over Getafe

arts.ttl: Barcelona 1-0 Getafe: Highlights, man of the match, stats
arts.sum: Robert Lewandowski sets a La Liga record to help Barcelona clinch a narrow 1-0 victory over winless Getafe at Estadi Olimpic Lluis Companys.
Barcelona kept the club’s flawless start to the new La Liga campaign alive and well on Wednesday night. As much came courtesy of a hard-fought downing of Getafe. Hansi Flick’s…

arts.ttl: Barcelona continue 100% record in La Liga with narrow victory over Getafe
arts.sum: Barcelona have continued their dominant start to the season, making it seven wins from seven in La Liga. However, it was not as convincing as it has been from Hansi Flick’s side, as they only managed to defeat Getafe by a 1-0 scoreline. arts.ttl: Photo: Barcelona’s star-studded cast of injured stars in attendance vs Getafe

arts.ttl: Barcelona’s stars send collective message to Marc-André ter Stegen before Getafe clash
arts.sum: Barcelona’s players on Wednesday night made use of the opportunity to send a collective message of support to teammate Marc-André ter Stegen. Goalkeeper Ter Stegen, of course, was dealt a…

arts.ttl: Why is Marc-Andre Ter Stegen not playing for Barcelona today against Getafe in LaLiga?
arts.sum: Marc-Andre Ter Stegen will not play for Barcelona against Getafe today, Wednesday 25 September, as the goalkeeper suffered a serious knee injury in the side’s last game that will see him out for the rest of the season . This type of injury can take anywhere from 7 months to 9 months recovery time, with Ter Stegen now unlikely to play any part of the Barcelona season that had started in a hugely promising manner, seeing them win 6 games from 6 in the league.

arts.ttl: Barcelona injury news: Eight players missing for Getafe contest
arts.sum: Barcelona will be missing eight first-team players for Thursday's La Liga clash against Getafe.

arts.ttl: Barcelona possible starting XI against Getafe today in LaLiga
arts.sum: The surprising starting eleven that Hansi Flick fielded last Sunday against Villarreal (1-5) makes predicting Barça’s lineup for tonight’s match against Getafe ( watch at 3:00 p.m. ET / 12:00 p.m. PT. This will be the first official match of the season for the Alicante-born goalkeeper, marking a pivotal opportunity in his career, as a strong start and a solid season as a starter could cement his place in the squad .
